alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Morehouse, southwestern East Carroll, northwestern Madison, northeastern Richland and West Carroll Parishes through 1115 PM CDT... At 1015 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Goodwill, or 13 miles east of Bastrop, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Darnell around 1055 PM CDT. Warden around 1105 PM CDT. Monticello around 1110 PM CDT. Delhi around 1115 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Forest, Collinston, Mer Rouge, Pioneer, Oak Ridge and Epps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll
